welcome_message_body: Welcome to Netanya, a charming city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and rich history. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Casa Mia
restaurants.description: Casa Mia is a italian restaurant located in נתניה.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sde Dov Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sde Dov Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ben Gurion Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.
